attributes.action: Stop Zero Hours Contracts due to workers being Abused.
attributes.additional_details:
Everybody should be on a Contract that gives them a Living income, how can anyone Live in a Normal manor not knowing what they may Earn each week, this is what's called 'Using People' wrong in this day and age, All workers should have a Minimum income set by a Contract.

These people must feel worthless can can not progress like others, very wrong and very Bias.

Let's get some sense back into working with Proper Contracts and stop Zero ones and give them hope in their lives.
attributes.background: At the moment companies can and do give No or very few hours one week and more as they require, people on these Stupid Contracts can not get Loans with their Benefits going up and down weekly, they stand No chance of Buying a Property or even renting Private, this is being Bias to these people.
